column1: (PAIR) outlined in CIH Paragraph 1538, a new PAIR will be required for:
column2: (PAIR) outlined in CIH Paragraph 1538, a new PAIR will be required for:
Peach trees that are greater than 15 years of age; and
Category C crops that exhibit a downward yield trend for the most recent three years
of actual yields (2013, 2010, and 2009) within their APH Database.
